analysis_notes.context: May 2024 - Bilal working to publish his Master's research on post-traumatic growth. Research examined factors (deliberate rumination, social support, spirituality, character strengths) that lead to PTG in entrepreneurs. Context: wars in Ukraine and Palestine, climate crisis.
analysis_notes.key_insight: This is Bilal's ACADEMIC WORK - Master's thesis research. Reveals his scholarly interests: PTG, spirituality-as-meaning-making, presilience over resilience, entrepreneurship as crisis preparation. The tension between spiritual insights and secular publishing requirements is significant.
